channel.title: Comments on: Ask a Pumpkin: Billy Corgan and Jimmy Chamberlin answer your questions via YouTube!

item.title: By: Brian
item.dc:creator: Brian
item.description: your nuts. BC is the man, the pumpkins are unreal..
item.content:encoded: your nuts. BC is the man, the pumpkins are unreal..

item.title: By: Logan Young
item.dc:creator: Logan Young
item.description: Here's one: "Billy, why is your poetry worse than Jewel, Jeff Tweedy and Ashanti's combined , and oh yeah, remember that time you were in that real shitty band? No, not that one - the other one."
item.content:encoded: Here’s one: “Billy, why is your poetry worse than Jewel, Jeff Tweedy and Ashanti’s combined , and oh yeah, remember that time you were in that real shitty band? No, not that one – the other one.”
